mapper.select: select t1.CREDIT_ID, t1.SUPP_ID, DISTR_ID, CREDIT_AMOUT, USED_AMOUT, STATE from (select credit_id, supp_id, distr_id, credit_amout, used_amout, state from t_credit where STATE = #{state}) as t1 inner join t_supp ts on t1.SUPP_ID = ts.SUPP_ID and ts.SUPP_NM like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')

select t1.CREDIT_ID, t1.SUPP_ID, t1.DISTR_ID, t1.CREDIT_AMOUT, t1.USED_AMOUT, t1.STATE from (select credit_id, supp_id, distr_id, credit_amout, used_amout, state from t_credit where STATE = #{state}) as t1 inner join t_distr td on t1.DISTR_ID = td.DISTR_ID and td.DISTR_NM like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')

SELECT t1.CREDIT_ID, t2.DISTR_NM, t3.SUPP_NM, t1.CREDIT_AMOUT, t1.USED_AMOUT, t1.STATE FROM t_credit t1, t_distr t2, t_supp t3 WHERE t1.DISTR_ID = t2.DISTR_ID AND t1.SUPP_ID = t3.SUPP_ID AND (t2.DISTR_NM like CONCAT("%",#{name},"%") OR t3.SUPP_NM like CONCAT("%",#{name},"%")) AND t1.STATE in(1,2)

SELECT t1.CREDIT_ID, t2.DISTR_NM, t3.SUPP_NM, t1.CREDIT_AMOUT FROM t_credit t1, t_distr t2, t_supp t3 WHERE t1.DISTR_ID = t2.DISTR_ID AND t1.SUPP_ID = t3.SUPP_ID AND (t2.DISTR_NM like CONCAT("%",#{name},"%") OR t3.SUPP_NM like CONCAT("%",#{name},"%")) AND t1.STATE = 0
SELECT t1.DEAL_ID, t3.COMM_NM, t2.count, t2.price, t1.create_time FROM t_deal t1, t_deal_d t2, t_paf_comm t3 WHERE t1.DISTR_ID = #{distrId} AND t2.comm_id = t3.COMM_ID AND t3.SUPP_ID = #{suppId}
